title: Miley Cyrus Says Her Plane Made Emergency Landing After Being Struck by Lightning; Singer was scheduled to perform at Asunci처nico music festival in Paraguay; show was canceled
text:
"Our plane was caught in a major unexpected storm," Ms. Cyrus wrote in her post. "My crew, band, friends and family who were all traveling with me are safe after an emergency landing. We were unfortunately unable to fly into Paraguay."

Ms. Cyrus was scheduled to headline the Asunci처nico music festival Thursday in Asunci처n, Paraguay.

A notice on the music festival's Twitter account said Thursday's lineup was canceled due to severe weather.

Along with the video, Ms. Cyrus also posted a photo of what looks like a damaged part of a plane.

Ms. Cyrus, who rose to fame playing an undercover teen pop star on Disney Channel's "Hannah Montana," has focused on her music career in recent years, releasing hits such as 2013's "Wrecking Ball." Her most recent album, 2020's "Plastic Hearts," debuted at No. 2 on the Billboard charts.

Her website says she is scheduled to perform Saturday at the Lollapalooza music festival in S찾o Paulo, Brazil.

Write to Joseph Pisani at joseph.pisani@wsj.com
